ta.title: இன்று பூர்வீக நாள் - பார்வையிட நாள்
body_lines: இது தொடர்பான கொண்டாட்டம் இன்று பழங்குடி கிராமத்தில் நடைபெற உள்ளது.

en.title: Today is Indigenous Day - Day to visit
body_lines: The celebration in this regard is due to be held at the Indigenous village today.

summary_lines: Indigenous Day is celebrated today, marking a special occasion to honor and visit indigenous communities. The festivities are taking place at the Indigenous village, a day dedicated to recognizing and celebrating the rich cultures and traditions of our first peoples.
